pages.title: Beehive Overclocker
pages.text: You can use Beehive Overclocker to make your bee produce even more faster. It needs energy and Electrode to work, better Electrode has higher speed boost.$(br)When you use multiple overclockers at the same time, the speed boosts are additive. That means two Netherite Electrodes(x25) can make bees work x50 faster.

pages.title: Electrode
pages.text: There four tiers of electrodes.$(li)Copper: x1.8$(li)Iron: x3$(li)Gold: x8$(li)Netherite: x25
